description.value: Regeneration doesn't function while Strahd is exposed to direct sunlight.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard, At-Will

+23 vs Fortitude; 3d10+5 necrotic damage, and the target is slowed until the end of Strahd's next turn. Hit or Miss: Strahd shifts up to 2 squares.

At-Will ✦ Healing

Standard

+23 vs Fortitude; 3d10+5 damage, and the target is weakened (save ends), and Strahd regains 20 hit points.

At-Will ✦ Charm, Gaze

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 5

+23 vs Will; the target is dominated and takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against being dominated (save ends both). Aftereffect: The target is dazed and takes ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends both). Strahd can have only one creature dominated at a time.

Encounter ✦ Poison, Zone

Standard

Area burst 5 within 10

Sustain Minor Or Move

The burst creates a zone of poisonous vapors that lasts until the end of Strahd's next turn. A creature that enters the zone or that starts its turn in the zone takes 1d10 + 5 poison damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends). Sustain Minor: The zone persists. Sustain Move: The zone persists, and Strahd can move it up to 5 squares.

At-Will ✦ Polymorph

Minor

Strahd transforms into a swarm of bats or a black wolf. He cannot use crippling strike or choking fog, though he gains new powers and statistics in addition to those he regularly has. Strahd can revert to his normal form as a minor action.

Encounter ✦ Polymorph

Standard

Sustain Minor; Encounter

All conditions affecting Strahd end, and he becomes insubstantial and gains fly (hover) 12 until the end of his next turn. Strahd cannot attack while in this form.
Strahd gains combat advantage against living, bloodied foes.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

Strahd spends a healing surge and regains 232 hit points. Strahd gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of his next turn.

Trigger: When reduced to 0 hit points

Strahd's mist form power recharges, and he uses it immediately. Strahd does not die, but he must reach his coffin within 2 hours or be destroyed.

system.biography:
HP 930; Bloodied 465
Regeneration 10 (regeneration doesn’t function while Strahd is exposed to direct sunlight)
Resist 15 necrotic Vulnerable 10 radiant Immune disease, poison 		Init +17 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 34Fort 32Ref 32Will 32
Speed 6, climb 4 (spider climb)
Ability ScoresStr 18 (+14)
Con 18 (+14)		Dex 20 (+15)
Int 23 (+16)		Wis 17 (+13)
Cha 26 (+18)
Languages Common, Supernal
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +23, Insight +18, Intimidate +23, Stealth +20Senses Blindsight 10,Darkvision
Passive Perception 23 | Insight 28
